title: Final boss Veigar pixelart
body:
Hello everyone, I want to share you this pixelart I've made from one of my favorite skins on the game hope you like it as much as I do.

Here are some links of some of my past pixelarts:
Final boss Veigar (DA): http://mi8am.deviantart.com/art/Final-Boss-Veigar-pixelart-633177376

Pool parti skins : http://mi8am.deviantart.com/art/Pool-Party-541673222

Ahri: http://mi8am.deviantart.com/art/Ahri-animation-537949659

replies.body: Woah, these are awesome! :D The Lulu is too cute!

Its beautiful!

The others are great too!

These are so sick! DO you mind If I use the Ahri animation for a fun thing i'm working on (amateur platformer game). Gonna have ahri be controllable and jumping around collecting hearts etc.

Obviously it wont be commericalized and I'll credit your art
